q: for an executive who is transitioning out of the CEO role- and may even be unusual for sitting CEOs, said David Wise, senior principal at management consulting firm Hay Group. But given Eric Schmidt 's success, the board clearly wants to retain his guidance for the next four years. `` It's a signal to shareholders that he'll continue to steer the boat,'' Wise added. Eric Schmidt , 55, is being replaced as Google Inc. 's CEO by co-founder Larry Page.

a major company such as Google.`` We have been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time,'' said Eric Schmidt in announcing the decision. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come.`` Page credited Eric Schmidt with running the company`` brilliantly while keeping the`` headstrong founders'' involved.`` Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him. His advice and efforts will be invaluable to me as I start in this new role

Vote-casting at the factory, which employs around 5,500 people, began on Thursday evening. Early estimates put voting turnout at 94.4 percent. The results of the ballot were expected around 2300 GMT. The voting slips that have been slipped into the factory's ballot boxes since yesterday are destined to change the country's industrial history, Silvio Berlusconi Sole 24 Ore business paper said in an editorial on Friday. The proposal announced by Sergio Marchionne would bring one billion euros($ 1.3 billion) in investments to historic Mirafiori, which would start producing

gains and greenhouse gas reductions from using a light-duty hydraulic hybrid system.`` Hydraulic hybrid vehicle technology is one more promising path worth pursuing in the effort to reduce our carbon footprint,'' Sergio Marchionne said. It has shown substantial increases in fuel economy when compared with traditional powertrains in the same type of vehicles. Both parties hope to reduce the size and complexity of the hybrid system and produce a technology that is sensitive to the needs of drivers for smooth and quiet operation. Kirsten Gillibrand , D-N.Y., said she had talked with Gabrielle Giffords ' husband, astronaut Mark Kelly, Saturday night.`` She's making progress every day,'' Kirsten Gillibrand said. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing. So... it's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury.
